```{r, contirbutor-ex, echo=F, fig.retina=2}
# Build list inside function
contributoR::contributor(
 contributions = list(
   "Author 1" = seq(1, 14, by = 3),
   "Author 2" = c(1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 13),
   "Lazy person" = NA,
   "Author 3" = c(2, 4, 8, 14), 
   "Advisor" = 12)
   )
```
